Body: Description: The normal login method to access the admin console 172.16.16.101 via https is possible. As a user, the client software cannot be downloaded via the web address because the web address is not accessible as a user.

What We've Learned Updated: 19.05
- asked for more details since there was nothing specific in the description

What We've Learned Updated: 19.05
- asked for more details since there was nothing specific in the description
- the customer is having trouble accessing ***/client.php/software to download the clients to install them for the end users
- asked them on what server version they're on so we can troubleshoot
